com.zebra.sdk.printer.discovery

Class BluetoothDiscoverer

  • Object
    • com.zebra.sdk.printer.discovery.BluetoothDiscoverer

  • public class BluetoothDiscoverer
extends Object
    A class that discovers Bluetooth® devices.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void findPrinters(android.content.Context context, DiscoveryHandler discoveryHandler)
      Find Bluetooth® devices that are discoverable.
      Note: This method will return all devices found, not just Zebra printers
      Note: This method should not be called from the application main thread.
      static void findPrinters(android.content.Context context, DiscoveryHandler discoveryHandler, DeviceFilter deviceFilter)
      Find Bluetooth® devices that are discoverable.
      Note: This method will return all devices found, not just Zebra printers
      Note: This method should not be called from the application main thread.
      Note: Android 6 and higher (API 23+) requires user permission ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION or ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION in your application manifest.
      static void findServices(android.content.Context context, String macAddress, ServiceDiscoveryHandler serviceDiscoveryHandler)
      Find services(ConnectionChannels) that are supported by the device at macAddress.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • findPrinters

        public static void findPrinters(android.content.Context context,
                DiscoveryHandler discoveryHandler,
                DeviceFilter deviceFilter)
                         throws ConnectionException
        Find Bluetooth® devices that are discoverable.
        Note: This method will return all devices found, not just Zebra printers
        Note: This method should not be called from the application main thread.
        Note: Android 6 and higher (API 23+) requires user permission ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION or ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION in your application manifest.
        Parameters:
        context - Android™ application context.
        discoveryHandler - a DiscoveryHandler instance that is used to handle discovery events (e.g. found a printer, errors, discovery finished).
        deviceFilter -
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - for communication or discovery errors.

      • findPrinters

        public static void findPrinters(android.content.Context context,
                DiscoveryHandler discoveryHandler)
                         throws ConnectionException
        Find Bluetooth® devices that are discoverable.
        Note: This method will return all devices found, not just Zebra printers
        Note: This method should not be called from the application main thread.
        Parameters:
        context - Android™ application context.
        discoveryHandler - a DiscoveryHandler instance that is used to handle discovery events (e.g. found a printer, errors, discovery finished).
        Throws:
        ConnectionException - for communication or discovery errors.

      • findServices

        public static void findServices(android.content.Context context,
                String macAddress,
                ServiceDiscoveryHandler serviceDiscoveryHandler)
        Find services(ConnectionChannels) that are supported by the device at macAddress.
        Parameters:
        context - Android™ application context.
        macAddress - MAC address of the device.
        serviceDiscoveryHandler - a ServiceDiscoveryHandler instance that is used to handle service discovery events.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - The Bluetooth MAC address is invalid
